summary: This mod changes Lydia's hairstyle for a cute hairstyle from ApachiiSkyHair mod
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Description[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][THIS MOD IS NOT STANDALONE][/color]

This mod changes Lydia's hairstyle for a cute hairstyle from ApachiiSkyHair mod
Obviously, this mod requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/][u][color=#00ffff]ApachiiSkyHair[/color][/u][/url].

THANKS FOR Bethesda and Apachii
author: KtreusB3B0
